title: Beyond Wild Expectations: Michigan’s Very Own Slice of Japan – Where Ancient Garden Design Provides a Deep Connection to Nature
description: There's a new perspective of self to discover with every changing season in Frederik Meijer Gardens & Sculpture Park's Japanese garden

title: China’s Fossil Fuel Power Output Set for First Drop in a Decade
description: China’s fossil fuel power plants are on track to chart their first annual drop in generation in a decade as renewables flood the grid to meet rising demand.

title: China’s Fossil Fuel Power Output Set for First Drop in a Decade - Bloomberg.com

title: Case Study: Successful management of blood sugar through ancient yogic practices
description: A Rajasthan man's blood sugar levels dramatically improved within seven days using a holistic wellness program combining naturopathy and yoga. Mr. Ashish Yadav saw his fasting blood sugar drop from 150 mg/dL to 92 mg/dL without allopathic medication. This integrated approach, focusing on diet, breathing exercises, and specific yoga poses, highlights potential for metabolic regulation.

title: Ancient mysticism, living faith: Kamakhya’s timeless power
